features.featureTitle: In the CompaniesSection component (frontend/src/components/CompaniesSection.tsx), modify the logo display implementation to ensure all five insurance company logos (Mutual of Omaha, Transamerica, Ethos, Fidelity and Guaranteed Life, and Forrester) are shown in their entirety without any cropping or cutoff, by adjusting container dimensions, object-fit properties, padding, and aspect ratio constraints so that each logo's full visual content is visible
